channel.title: Uke Along Artist » The White Stripes

item.title: The White Stripes - Seven Nation Army
item.description:
**This is the version for Bass Ukulele. Most people don't have bass ukuleles. Here's a link to a play along of the same song for soprano / concert ukulele. https://youtu.be/XQR70Pasw9A
For educational use.
It’s a TAB song. There are not chords in the tutorial video.
Seven Nation Army by White Stripes. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.

item.title: The White Stripes - Apple Blossom
item.description:
Written & performed by The White Stripes
Am7 chords are there to signify the strumming pattern.
